title: JUNIOR LAWYER
description:
START YOUR PROFESSIONAL CAREER IN SPAIN 
1.	Lawyer native speaker of Dutch or Flemish. 
2.	Lawyer native speaker of Russian 
3.	Lawyer native speaker of French. 
4.	Lawyer native speaker of German.

We offer you to start your professional career in Spain, working in the Lawyers Office in Mabrella near Málaga in Spain. 

We require a young, recently graduated student of law, with a good academic record that is interested in working in Spain.

It is necessary to be bilingual in English and apart from you native language you should know some Spanish

We offer you the professional career in the International environment, and the salary that allow you to be independent in our country.
how_to_apply:
If you are interested in working here please do not hesitate to send us your CV in English to
angela.perez@hays.es  with the reference: 1006262.

In the case of any question please contact.

Ángela Pérez or Loreto Peñuela  Tel. no: 0034 954932381.
